---
title: "Shining"
---

This is a tutorial on creating Shiny apps. It assumes the following:

-   You are comfortable using R

-   You have RStudio and R installed

This tutorial was last updated in June 2025.

The tutorial will show you how to create a new shiny app, add objects to the user interface, and define the code to read in a data file and produce some output.

Please use the dropdown menu to the left of the page title to navigate.
